page.title: 07MORRIS DANCING
page.content:
My name is Linda-jane and I am ten years old. On saturdays I go Morris Dancing. We start at 9 o'clock in the morning and the competitions can go on until 7 o'clock in the evening.
I used to be a leader for a troupe called Queensway Royals. This means I used to hit a tambourine which would tell the other dancers when to turn. They all carried shakers which make a spectacular display when they all make their arm movements together.
Today I brought my medals into school to show everyone. About four weeks ago my mum was training to be a judge. Last week she passed her test.
Linda-Jane Doherty
